tool_description: Find rehab centers by state or near your location by querying this complete and comprehensive API.
name: Rehab Centers USA
title: Rehab Centers USA

api_list.name: Get Nearby Facilities Data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rehab-centers-usa.p.rapidapi.com/facilities/get-nearby-facilities-data/3/10/80/10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rehab-centers-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rehab-centers-usa.p.rapidapi.com/facilities/get-nearby-facilities-data/{facilityid}/{radius}/{overviewchars}/{limit}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rehab-centers-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Nearby Facilities IDs
api_list.description:
Get Nearby Facilities by facility id
default radius: 10 km
default limit: 10 result

default overViewChars: 80
max: overViewChars 290
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rehab-centers-usa.p.rapidapi.com/facilities/get-nearby-facilities/3/3.5/10"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rehab-centers-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
